meta.title: Overlay
meta.description: The b-overlay component is used to visually obscure a particular element or component and its content. It signals to the user of a state change within the element or component and can be used for creating loaders, warnings/alerts and more.

props.description: CSS color to use as the opaque overlay backdrop color. If set, overrides the `variant` prop
Value for the CSS blur backdrop-filter. Be sure to include the CSS units. Not supported in IE 11. Set to null or an empty string to disable blurring
When prop `no-wrap` is set, will use fixed positioning instead of absolute positioning. Handy if you want to obscure the entire application page
When set, disables the vertical and horizontal centering of the overlay content
Disables the fade transition of the overlay
Disabled generating the wrapper element, and ignored the default slot. Requires that `<b-overlay>` be placed in an element with position relative set
Opacity of the overlay backdrop. Valid range is `0` to `1`
Element tag to use as for the overlay element
Apply rounding to the overlay to match your content routing. Valid values are `true`, `'sm'`, `lg`, `circle`, `pill`, `top`, `right`, `bottom`, or `left`
When set, renders the default spinner in a smaller size
Type of the default spinner to show. Current supported types are 'border' and 'grow'
Applies one of the Bootstrap theme color variants to the default spinner. Default is to use the current font color
Background theme color variant to use for the overlay backdrop
Element tag to use for the overall wrapper element. Has no effect if prop `no-wrap` is set
Z-index value to apply to the overlay. You may need to increase this value to suit your content or placement

events.description: Emitted when the overlay has been hidden
Emitted when the overlay has been shown

slots.name: default
slots.description: The content to be overlayed. The default slot is ignored if the prop `no-wrap` is set

slots.name: overlay
slots.description: Custom content to replace the default overlay spinner
